Utilities
BootstrapAround

Gallery

JavaScript based lightbox component for presenting various types of media.

Around component

Gallery component relies on 3rd party plugin. Make sure to link to Light Gallery css and js files in your document: vendor/lightgallery.js/dist/css/lightgallery.min.css and lightgallery.js/dist/js/lightgallery.min.js. If you need extra features like zooming, fullscreen view or video you need to include additional plugins:

  • vendor/lg-fullscreen.js/dist/lg-fullscreen.min.js
  • vendor/lg-zoom.js/dist/lg-zoom.min.js
  • vendor/lg-video.js/dist/lg-video.min.js

Use this page as a reference.

Media: Image

  • Result
  • HTML
  • Pug
Gallery image caption
<!-- Image gallery -->
<div class="cs-gallery">
  <a href="path-to-large-image" class="cs-gallery-item rounded-lg" data-sub-html='<h6 class="font-size-sm text-light">Gallery image caption</h6>'>
    <img src="path-to-thumbnail-image" alt="Gallery thumbnail">
    <span class="cs-gallery-caption">Gallery image caption</span>
  </a>
</div>
// Image gallery
.cs-gallery
  a(href="path-to-large-image", data-sub-html='<h6 class="font-size-sm text-light">Gallery image caption</h6>').cs-gallery-item.rounded-lg
    +image("path-to-thumbnail-image", "Gallery thumbnail")
    span.cs-gallery-caption Gallery image caption

Media: Video

  • Result
  • HTML
  • Pug
Gallery video caption
<!-- Video gallery -->
<div class="cs-gallery">
  <a href="link-to-youtube/vimeo-video" class="cs-gallery-item cs-gallery-video rounded-lg" data-sub-html='<h6 class="font-size-sm text-light">Gallery video caption</h6>'>
    <img src="path-to-thumbnail-image" alt="Gallery thumbnail">
    <span class="cs-gallery-caption">Gallery video caption</span>
  </a>
</div>
// Video gallery
.cs-gallery
  a(href="link-to-youtube/vimeo-video", data-sub-html='<h6 class="font-size-sm text-light">Gallery video caption</h6>').cs-gallery-item.video-item.rounded-lg
    +image("path-to-thumbnail-image", "Gallery thumbnail")
    span.cs-gallery-caption Gallery video caption

Media: Iframe (Google map)

  • Result
  • HTML
  • Pug
Google map embed
<!-- Iframe (Google map) -->
<div class="cs-gallery">
  <a href="link-to-google-map-embed" class="cs-gallery-item rounded-lg" data-sub-html='<h6 class="font-size-sm text-light">Google map embed</h6>'>
    <img src="path-to-thumbnail-image" alt="Gallery thumbnail">
    <span class="cs-gallery-caption">Google map embed</span>
  </a>
</div>
// Iframe (Google map)
.cs-gallery
  a(href="link-to-google-map-embed", data-sub-html='<h6 class="font-size-sm text-light">Google map embed</h6>').cs-gallery-item.rounded-lg
    +image("path-to-thumbnail-image", "Gallery thumbnail")
    span.cs-gallery-caption Google map embed

Grid with gutters

  • Result
  • HTML
  • Pug
Gallery image caption #1
Gallery image caption #2
Gallery image caption #3
Gallery image caption #4
Gallery image caption #5
Gallery image caption #6
<!-- Gallery grid with gutters -->
<div class="row cs-gallery">

  <!-- Item -->
  <div class="col-xl-4 col-sm-6 mb-grid-gutter">
    <a href="path-to-large-image" class="cs-gallery-item rounded-lg" data-sub-html='<h6 class="font-size-sm text-light">Gallery image caption</h6>'>
      <img src="path-to-thumbnail-image" alt="Gallery thumbnail">
      <span class="cs-gallery-caption">Gallery image caption</span>
    </a>
  </div>

  <!-- Item -->
  <div class="col-xl-4 col-sm-6 mb-grid-gutter">
    ....
  </div>

  <!-- Add as many columns with gallery item inside as you need -->
</div>
// Gallery grid with gutters
.row.cs-gallery

  //- Item
  .col-xl-4.col-sm-6.mb-grid-gutter
    a(href="path-to-large-image", data-sub-html='<h6 class="font-size-sm text-light">Gallery image caption</h6>').cs-gallery-item.rounded-lg
      +image("path-to-thumbnail-image", "Gallery thumbnail")
      span.cs-gallery-caption Gallery image caption
  
  //- Item
  .col-xl-4.col-sm-6.mb-grid-gutter
    ...

  //- Add as many columns with gallery item inside as you need

Inside card

  • Result
  • HTML
  • Pug
Card with gallery thumbnail

Some quick example text to build on the card title and make up the bulk of the card's content.

Go somewhere 
<!-- Gallery inside card -->
<div class="card cs-gallery">
  <a href="path-to-large-image" class="cs-gallery-item card-img-top" data-sub-html='<h6 class="font-size-sm text-light">Gallery image caption</h6>'>
    <img src="path-to-thumbnail-image" alt="Gallery thumbnail">
  </a>
  <div class="card-body">
    <h5 class="card-title">Card with gallery thumbnail</h5>
    <p class="card-text font-size-sm">Some quick example text to build on the card title and make up the bulk of the card's content.</p>
    <a href="#" class="btn btn-sm btn-primary">Go somewhere</a>
  </div>
</div>
// Gallery inside card
.card.cs-gallery
  a(href="path-to-large-image", data-sub-html='<h6 class="font-size-sm text-light">Gallery image caption</h6>').cs-gallery-item.rounded-lg
    +image("path-to-thumbnail-image", "Gallery thumbnail")
  .card-body
    h5.card-title
      | Card with gallery thumbnail
    p.card-text.font-size-sm
      | Some quick example text to build on the card title and make up the bulk of the card's content.
    a.btn.btn-sm.btn-primary(href="#") Go somewhere

Inside carousel

  • Result
  • HTML
  • Pug
Gallery image caption #1
Gallery image caption #2
Gallery image caption #3
Gallery image caption #4
Gallery image caption #5
Gallery image caption #6
<!-- Gallery inside carousel  -->
<div class="cs-carousel cs-controls-center cs-gallery">
  <div class="cs-carousel-inner" data-carousel-options='{"nav": false, "responsive": {"0":{"items":1},"576":{"items":2, "gutter": 20},"1200":{"items":3, "gutter": 30}}}'>

    <!-- Item -->
    <div>
      <a href="path-to-large-image" class="cs-gallery-item" data-sub-html='<h6 class="font-size-sm text-light">Gallery image caption</h6>'>
        <img src="path-to-thumbnail-image" alt="Gallery thumbnail">
        <span class="cs-gallery-caption">Gallery image caption</span>
      </a>
    </div>

     <!-- Add as many gallery items wrapped in divs as you need -->
  </div>
</div>
// Gallery inside carousel
.cs-carousel.cs-controls-center.cs-gallery
  .cs-carousel-inner(data-carousel-options='{"nav": false, "responsive": {"0":{"items":1},"576":{"items":2, "gutter": 20},"1200":{"items":3, "gutter": 30}}}')

    //- Item
    div
      a(href="path-to-large-image", data-sub-html='<h6 class="font-size-sm text-light">Gallery image caption</h6>').cs-gallery-item.rounded-lg
        +image("path-to-thumbnail-image", "Gallery thumbnail")
        span.cs-gallery-caption Gallery image caption
    
    //- Add as many gallery items wrapped in divs as you need
